form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently extend the subpart F exemption for active financing income.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Permanent Active Financing Exception Act of 2015.

section.header: Permanent subpart F exemption for active financing income

subsection.text: Section 954(h) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 (relating to special rule for income derived in the active conduct of banking, financing, or similar businesses) is amended by striking paragraph (9).
Section 953(e) of such Code (relating to exempt insurance income) is amended by striking paragraph (10) and by redesignating paragraph (11) as paragraph (10).

The amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years of a foreign corporation beginning after December 31, 2014, and to taxable years of United States shareholders with or within which such taxable years of such foreign corporation end.
